projectsData.name: Portfolio Website
projectsData.description: A personal portfolio showcasing my web development projects, skills, and experience. This site highlights the work I've done with various technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, and features details on past projects, my technical expertise, and ways to get in touch.

careerData.name: Software Engineer
careerData.description: Designed, developed, and maintained web applications, ensuring efficient, reusable, and reliable code. Collaborated with cross-functional teams in various aspects of development, including front-end, back-end, and database design.

careerData.name: Junior Programmer
careerData.description: Managed several software projects, ensuring on-time delivery and quality output while mentoring junior developers.
